component.name: DOSBox-X
component.summary: x86/DOS emulator with sound and graphics

description.p: DOSBox-X is an enhanced DOSBox fork with more accurate emulation, including the ability to run Windows 95 and 98. It also adds support for the NEC PC-98.

DOSBox-X emulates a legacy IBM PC and DOS environment, and has many emulation options and features such as:
8086, 286, 386, 486, Pentium, Pentium MMX and Pentium Pro CPU options
Mounting host directory, Harddisk Images, Diskette Images and CD-ROM images
ISO9660, FAT12, FAT16 and FAT32 filesystem support including long filenames
MDA, CGA, Hercules, EGA, MCGA, VGA and S3/ET3000/ET4000 SVGA video adapter emulation
Various SoundBlaster models, Gravis Ultrasound, Disney Sound source and more audio options
MT-32 and MIDI support and emulation options
Printer support and emulation options
Network emulation (NE2000)
Support for running Windows 3.1, Windows 95 and Windows 98
With the help of DOSBox-X, it can run plenty of the old classics that don't run on your new computer!
